    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83362</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83362</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Contrôle de l'émission de radiation</string>
            <string language="en">Controlling radiation emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steuernstrahlung Emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emissão controlando da radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emissione gestente di radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελέγχοντας εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emisión de la radiación que controla</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment contrôler  l'émission de rayonnement en chauffant (à gauche) ou en  refroidissant (à droite) un objet.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how to control radiation emission by heating (left) or cooling (right) an object.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se refroidissant</string>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">chauffant</string>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement infrarouge</string>
            <string language="en">infra-red radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">radiation</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie man Strahlung Emission
steuert, indem sie erhitzt (nach links) oder (recht) eine Nachricht 
abkühlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como controlar a 
emissão da radiação aquecendo (à esquerda) ou refrigerando 
(direito) um objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come gestire 
l'emissione di radiazione riscaldando (a sinistra) o raffreddando (di 
destra) un oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς να ελέγξει την 
εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας με τη θέρμανση (αριστερά) ή την ψύξη 
(δεξιά) ενός αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo controlar la 
emisión de la radiación calentando (a la izquierda) o refrescando 
(derecho) un objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotstrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refrigerar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação infravermelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raffreddamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radiazione infrarossa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ψύξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέρμανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπέρυθρη ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el refrescarse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiación infrarroja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación</string>
          </keyword>
